Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
dao.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
Central manager class for database operations within the MVC architecture.

This class acts as an intermediary between the controllers and the specific DAO classes (GameDAO, ClientDAO, UserDAO, GameSessionDAO). It initializes the database connection through DatabaseConnector and provides access to all DAO instances.

Additionally, it allows executing custom SQL queries directly using the specificQuery(String, Connection) method.

Since:
3.3
Author:
Davitroon

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseManager

      public DatabaseManager(ExceptionMessage exceptionMessage)
      Constructs a DatabaseManager with a reference to the exception handling system.
      Parameters:
      exceptionMessage - class responsible for displaying or logging database-related errors.
      Since:
      3.3

  • Method Details

    • initializeClasses

      public void initializeClasses() throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Initializes the database connection and all DAO classes used to interact with different entities in the database.

      This method should be called once during the application's startup to prepare all database-related modules.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while establishing the database connection.
      ClassNotFoundException - if the JDBC driver is not found.
      Since:
      3.3

    • getDbConnection

      public DatabaseConnector getDbConnection()
      Retrieves the current database connector instance.
      Returns:
      the DatabaseConnector responsible for managing the connection.
      Since:
      3.3

      Returns:

      Since:

    • specificQuery

      public ResultSet specificQuery(String specificQuery, Connection connection)
      Executes a custom SQL query and returns its ResultSet.

      This method allows running dynamic SQL queries that are not covered by the predefined DAO methods.

      Parameters:
      specificQuery - the SQL query to execute.
      connection - the active Connection to use.
      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing the results of the query, or null if an exception occurs.
      Since:
      3.3
